channel.title: Pytorch on InfiX-AI
channel.description: Recent content in Pytorch on InfiX-AI

item.title: InfiGFusion
item.description: Structure-aware extension that builds co-activation graphs from logits and aligns them via efficient Gromov-Wasserstein loss approximation.

item.title: InfiFusion
item.description: A logit-level fusion pipeline based on Universal Logit Distillation, enhanced with Top-K filtering and logits standardization.
